name: Windfallers
description:
Become a Windfaller, a mercenary of the skies with an unlikely crew in this action siege adventure! From heists, to deliveries and other more... sinister contracts, there's no job too big or small for your scrappy crew. Did I mention your airship has a trebuchet?

Everyone has problems

Which is great for business! And your job is to fix those problems however you see fit. But be careful who you might cross, or you know, double cross — things get messy when there's money and airships involved.

Sign on the bottom line please

You'll need to pick and choose which contracts to sign. Not all patrons have good intentions. It's easy to pick up a package. It's harder when that package has 4 arms, a foot long beard and is cursing your grandmothers existence.

When armies won't work, they call you

Your crew is talented. I mean, they're also strapped with weapons and have a mad flying Gyrotech on call — but let's not downplay their combat skills! Every arrow and slash counts in Windfallers, that's why there's excessive slowmo to show off your mad skills.

Slower you dolt!

Your mad skill as a Windfaller grants you tactical slow motion in combat. It doesn't make things easier, it just makes them look over 9000% cooler.

Home is where the hacksaw is

The once abandoned tavern outside of town is where your team calls home. It's about time you make it look like one! Just because your crew is scrappy doesn't mean your home has to be! Upgrade it for crew perks and maybe even a little bit of money on the side.

Unlikely friends

Nobody is perfect. You know this in your heart, and I think it's why your crew sticks around! What first started as a way to make money to leave the Mainland, might just turn into something more...
